amber.name: Amber
amber.description: Amber is a planet far away from Earth. It is a planet of great beauty and great danger. The planet is covered in a thick, dense jungle, with towering trees and thick undergrowth. The planet is home of the Trantorians, a smart and intelligent species that has evolved to live in the dense jungle.

onyx.name: Onyx
onyx.description: Onyx is THE User Interface that allow you to live in the digital world which is Amber. It is a powerful and user friendly interface, which such a great design that you will never want to leave it. Onyx is the key to access all the features of Amber, and it is the only way to interact with the planet.

turing.name: Turing
turing.description: Turing AI represents the intelligence of the Trantorians. It is a powerful AI that has been designed to make the Trantorians level up their intelligence and knowledge. Turing AI represents an evolutive intelligence that is constantly learning and evolving. It is the key to the future of the Trantorians.
